name: Tap Evolution - Game Clicker
description:
Here comes the next level evolution game! Are you ready for greatest manipulation in the evolution process ever? Open evolution box and enjoy how you can control the process.

Combine different species and see how these species are evolving into something scary, bizarre and ………
Ready to TAP?
How to play
• Tap and play
• Use the boosts to drive evolution process faster
• Don't forget to choose the evolution tree
Highlights
• Stage by stage evolution process
• Different kind of species from recognizable to bizarre
• Many possible transformations by using the right evolution tree
• Boosts, to make the evolution more faster
• No one was harmed in the process of making the game
Discover the world of evolution by downloading Tap Evolution! Have fun!

To learn more, join the Tap Evolution community!

Visit our website http://bugartgames.com/game-evolution.html
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tapevolution
